website_summaries.verdict: Great price but the size is limiting for most gun owners.
pros: Opens quickly and in dead silence, unlike some of other safes on our shortlist
cons: Small size will not allow you to store more than one gun

customer_reviews.title: High-quality safe that is still reasonably portable
customer_reviews.text: This is a high-quality safe. It is reasonably portable with a nylon handle, even though it is built very solid. The cable and attachment mechanism is great and very easy to use. Also, the locking mechanism engages in three places across the opening, using a cam-style system that seems very solid. Finally, the opening piston works well but isn't overkill (it is relatively quiet). This was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: G. Tassone

customer_reviews.title: SentrySafe Portable Gun Safe w/Key Lock & Tether Cable safe ...
customer_reviews.text: SentrySafe Portable Gun Safe w/Key Lock & Tether Cable safe is simple and basic. Just what I needed! I wanted a simple and basic pistol safe (without having to charging, needing batteries, malfunctioning codes and fingerprints, etc) to secure in my car and in my house. The safe is a bit heavy, but still very portable and serves it purpose. I can take it to the range, secure it in my car, and attached the cable to my bed frame. It come with two key, just put the spare somewhere safe. it loses a star because the box is a bit heavy, but the lid seams thin, not proportionately thick/strong.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mckinney

customer_reviews.title: ... now have a few of these and they are GREAT. As an instructor I was looking for something ...
customer_reviews.text: So I now have a few of these and they are GREAT. As an instructor I was looking for something to securely transport and store my training firearms in and this product is perfect for that use. They look and feel solid and appear to be of great quality. I also feel like they are mush harder to defeat then some of the similar products on the market. I actually recommend them to my student for their personal use. I was able to put 2 full size handguns in them and a few mags (S&W M&P 40 Cal). The really are a great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Geonney

customer_reviews.title: Cable easily detaches.  Keep an eye on it.
customer_reviews.text: Overall an adequate safe. The reason for the three stars is that once opened the cable that you use to attach the safe to your car, bed, etc. can become detached from the safe. If you don't notice it the whole safe can be simply taken and broken into at the criminal's convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Cap'n Dave

customer_reviews.title: Loved the safe it's roomy and has enough room for ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved the safe it's roomy and has enough room for a full size and probably 1-2 mags. However I didn't like that it unlocks the cord every time you open it so after it unlocks you have to re adjust it back under the seat and put it inside the safe in order to lock the cord but other than that it was good!
customer_reviews.author: Mj

customer_reviews.title: May not fit all all firearms. Will not store holstered firearms
customer_reviews.text: I have a Glock 19 that has a RMR sight on it and get the box securely shut I have to push down fairly hard to get it to lock. I also have a Smith & Wesson Shield that fits better into the safe but you will not be able to store a firearm inside of a holster in this safe.
customer_reviews.author: Jason B.

customer_reviews.title: Low security, but works for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Would be easy to break into with commonly available tools, but it works well to protect weapons from thieves looking for an easy target or young children. Definitely keep it hidden and inside a locked car or secure closet.
customer_reviews.author: Doublewolf

customer_reviews.title: A good quality product....
customer_reviews.text: A nice quality lock box. Fits perfectly under my drivers seat. I did remove the foam on the underside of the lid for more room and I wrapped a piece of wire around the end of the cable inside the box to keep it from coming loose when unlocked. Works great for my needs for a lock box in my vehicle..
customer_reviews.author: JOHN F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Storage  Safe to keep curious children Safe
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted a place to store her pistol when our granddaughter was at the house and also to transport it in her car when she wasn't carrying concealed. After reviewing several pistol safes, I purchased this one. It well built of strong steel, the lid is made in such a way that prying open would take some definite aggressive force. Without the key, a child would not be able to open it. There are others on the market; cheaper in price, but for the money, this one is superior.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Ronn

customer_reviews.title: Solid. Needs dual cables and internal clips on the cables. Needs replacement cables available.
customer_reviews.text: Box is solid. I really wish it had 2 of the security cables provided. I can't find a replacement cable. I bought two addition similar cables but they do not fit. No internal clip on the cable, so you are only relying on the lid design that closes down on the cable. Time will tell I guess.
customer_reviews.author: iBuyThings

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, very secure
customer_reviews.text: Overall solid and secure. Lock sticks a little and I’m concerned about the longevity of the handle. But overall, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but it does stand out.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality little safe. a bit tight to close if the gun is in the holster but it does do as advertised. I have not tried to break into it so I cannot comment on how easy or difficult this would be. Due to the size it is not easy to hide. It does stand out like a sore thumb so if you do not have a huge space under a seat or in the trunk, you might want to cover it with something so that it is not so obvious.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hault

customer_reviews.title: Lock mechanism breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: I thought this safe was decent in that the law enforcement agency I work for bought them. BIG MISTAKE. TOTAL JUNK. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: firecamper

customer_reviews.title: Safe seems to be adequate for the application but did ...
customer_reviews.text: Safe seems to be adequate for the application but did not come with security cable that I thought was part of the package
customer_reviews.author: Brad Alcorn

customer_reviews.title: This is a great car safe for your gun
customer_reviews.text: This is a great car safe for your gun. The inside foam would not stay stuck to the lid. Was easier to toss it. The cable disconnects too easy from the case once opened. When the case is closed properly the cable stays securely attatched.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy S

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: No problem going through TSA checkpoint at airports. Cable is long enough to wrap around suitcase brace and still be able to position the safe in the suitcase around clothing and such. Make sure you weigh your suitcase after packing to make sure you don't exceed the airlines checked bag weight limits. This case isn't light and could put you above your weight limit. It works great as an in room safe too.
customer_reviews.author: Racer-13

customer_reviews.title: Gun safe for transporting handguns
customer_reviews.text: It’s a tight fit for even a smaller handgun. Sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Mark H.

customer_reviews.title: This is a much more quality product than I expected ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a much more quality product than I expected. However, it is too large and heavy for what I intended it as a portable safe for a vehicle or travel. I might be limited to where I carry it, but I am keeping it as it is indeed well made.
customer_reviews.author: W. Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: really too large and clunky to use regularly in a vehicle - which is what I intended it for
customer_reviews.author: H Paul Eldridge

customer_reviews.title: Solid.
customer_reviews.text: Appears very study and feels solid. Fits underneath my truck seat. I feel very comfortable knowing my kids will not be able to easily access my firearms when placed inside and that no one will be able to walk off with it in the event the break into my vehicle unless the come with a saw or bolt cutters. Holds a compact pistol and two 15 round magazines. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: Basic gun lock box. secured to a seat post. Seems heavy duty enough that someone will not be able to gain access quickly. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: kirk albanese

customer_reviews.title: Excellent safe!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great safe! It comes with two keys which open the top cover quickly. The interior of the safe has excellent high-density foam to protect your firearm. The included cable works well although I wish it were a little bit longer. Nonetheless, this is a great safe for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Metrologist

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be well built. I was surprised on how much it weighs. It will fit a full-size pistol with extra stuff no problem. The cable is thicker then what'd you would find on those cheaper car safes.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Good Car safe for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Was missing a screw on the inside when first opened. also the spring loaded lid stopped working after about 10 openings, I drilled a small hole and put a small knob handle on top. other then that it works great and I feel very confident leaving firearms and valuables in it when necessary. I pulled on it with about all my strength to test the cam lock and cable and it was not going anywhere. I would recommend to a friend but the QC needs improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P.

customer_reviews.title: Happy camper
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to fit in my motorcycle tour pack. Easy to open and close👍
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Solution
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding in every way. Not only are the contents secure, but the safe is cable locked to the inside of my automobile trunk. Just hook the cable around one of the exposed supports and then to the safe. Double protection. The safe is well designed and much better than the plastic pistol cases.
customer_reviews.author: William Tell

customer_reviews.title: Decent for a safe
customer_reviews.text: Not bad to have some safe like this in your car or bring it to somewhere with you. *Update: the top foam fell off, glue not even lasted for 3 months....
customer_reviews.author: Long N.

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made, but the glue they use to install ...
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made, but the glue they use to install the foam lining is terrible. Smells like rubber cement, does not set up, foam falls off lid. I peeled off the sticky glue and replaced it with foam mountint tape. Problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: Trent Combs

customer_reviews.title: Feeling more secure
customer_reviews.text: I like the ruggedness and the size is great for most handguns. There is room enough to store extra magazines. The cable seems heavy enough unlike others that are so wimpy.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: carry handle makes it transport like a small briefcase
customer_reviews.text: this safe is compact. fits under seat in both cars. padded inside to protect contents. carry handle makes it transport like a small briefcase. I have 2, one in each car for my conceal and carry gun.
customer_reviews.author: P. Nich

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and sturdy, but make sure your firearm is not sliding ...
customer_reviews.text: Convenient and sturdy, but make sure your firearm is not sliding free on the inside hitting metal box walls. You may need to add some extra padding. 1911 will slide.
customer_reviews.author: Entity Entrant

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little safe
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little safe. My Ruger SP101 4" fits nicely, but it won't take a gun too much bigger. Not for 6" barrels.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kopp

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: well constructed, fits under my front seat, and no batteries. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: ItsMrJtoU

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: no problem at all with the key as i read in some reviews here. functions as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: dustin

customer_reviews.title: portable pistol safe
customer_reviews.text: well built perfect size and style fits well under the seat or in the trunk.
customer_reviews.author: HOSS

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: After a year, I have changed my review to this is garbage. Originally, it locked but the locking cable wasnt secure in the side so it couldn't be secured to anything. Now after a year, it won't even unlock and I can't get it open.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it and it's perfect - safely stashed and occupied, it is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: robear

customer_reviews.title: I NEVER LEAVE HOME WITHOUT IT!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS VERY TOUGH AND VERY SECURE! EASY TO OPERATE AND RELOCATE! GUN BOX FOR THE ROAD AND VALUABLES BOX FOR THE HOTEL VISITS!
customer_reviews.author: Fred J.

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: The padding inside is huge so hardly anything fit in there. Otherwise it's pretty convenient to have it on you
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: A nice quality locking box
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted I needed to safely secure my pistol. A nice quality locking box.....unlike some junk out there.
customer_reviews.author: David's Bargain Books

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great safe to secure a fire arm in a car ..
customer_reviews.author: Jack Robinson Jr

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Fits under the passenger seat
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Fits under the passenger seat. Can be a little tricky to work with one hand, the lid has a spring that pops it open.
customer_reviews.author: Swisstec

customer_reviews.title: It's okay, not great
customer_reviews.text: This product seems secure enough once locked but it's impossible to lock and unlock with one hand which is what I was hoping for. The security cable also wants to pull out the side when retrieving it from under the seat enough to open the lid as the locking of the lid is what keeps the cable in place. Had I seen this in a store and had the opportunity to work the mechanisms I would not have bought it. But now that I've made the investment I'm making it work.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne L. Rotter

customer_reviews.title: Positive with comment
customer_reviews.text: I like very much but I would like the cable to be able to also stay locked from the inside while unlocked and retriving items
customer_reviews.author: Terry M Bargy

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good price. You can expect to pay a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good price. You can expect to pay a lot more for this product. The safe and locking cable are very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Danks

customer_reviews.title: Not quite
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately not as advertised. It was supposed to be same as the better model except no keypad and it comes with the cable. I was disappointed to find there is no piston or spring to open the door and you basically have to lift it with your fingernail to open it and hold it open. Not how it was advertised. It's basically a metal box for 90 dollars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Portable, but large and heavy
customer_reviews.text: I like this safe overall, but at 8 pounds it's rather heavy and at 10.1 x 11.3 x 3.4 inches it's large. I prefer the GunVault NV100 NanoVault with Key Lock at one third the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

product_meta.title: SentrySafe PP1K Portable Gun Safe, Black, One Handgun Capacity
product_meta.description:
The SentrySafe PP1K Portable Gun Safe with Tether Cable protects your gun from unauthorized access and theft with solid steel construction and a pry resistant door. This gun safe was specially designed to provide on-the-go security with a convenient carrying handle, a steel tethering cable to secure your items and a foam interior to prevent damage to your handguns and other valuables while on the move.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
portable pistol innovations: quick entry, CA DOJ approved, high compression foam, CAM - clutch system for cable, in or out of vehicle usage, pry-resistant top lid design, key entry, solid steel construction, pry resistant door and hinges.
feature_bullets: Portable gun safe provides secure storage for one standard handgun while traveling; interior foam helps protect gun from damage
Built with a carrying handle for easily transportation and a tether cable to attach gun safe to a stationary object for added security
Gun safe is constructed with solid steel and a pry resistant door for strength; California DOJ certified gun safe
Gun safe is equipped with a key lock and comes with two keys
Exterior: 11.3 in. W x 10.0 in. D. x 3.3 in. H; Interior 9.8 in. W x 7.3 in. D x 3.0 in. H; weighs 6.5 pounds

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars106 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
